Card.Name: Elvish Spirit Guide
Card.RulesText: Exile Elvish Spirit Guide from your hand: Add {G}.

Card.Name: Simian Spirit Guide
Card.RulesText: Exile Simian Spirit Guide from your hand: Add {R}.

Card.Name: Street Wraith
Card.RulesText: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) Cycling—Pay 2 life. (Pay 2 life, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

Card.Name: Tinder Wall
Card.RulesText: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Sacrifice Tinder Wall: Add {R}{R}. {R}, Sacrifice Tinder Wall: It deals 2 damage to target creature it's blocking.

Card.Name: Burning Wish
Card.RulesText: You may reveal a sorcery card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. Exile Burning Wish.

Card.Name: Chrome Mox
Card.RulesText: Imprint — When Chrome Mox enters the battlefield, you may exile a nonartifact, nonland card from your hand. {T}: Add one mana of any of the exiled card's colors.

Card.Name: Desperate Ritual
Card.RulesText: Add {R}{R}{R}. Splice onto Arcane {1}{R} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

Card.Name: Empty the Warrens
Card.RulesText: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens. Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

Card.Name: Goblin Charbelcher
Card.RulesText: {3}, {T}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a land card. Goblin Charbelcher deals damage equal to the number of nonland cards revealed this way to any target. If the revealed land card was a Mountain, Goblin Charbelcher deals double that damage instead. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in any order.

Card.Name: Land Grant
Card.RulesText: If you have no land cards in hand, you may reveal your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Search your library for a Forest card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

Card.Name: Lion's Eye Diamond
Card.RulesText: Discard your hand, Sacrifice Lion's Eye Diamond: Add three mana of any one color. Activate only as an instant.

Card.Name: Lotus Petal
Card.RulesText: {T}, Sacrifice Lotus Petal: Add one mana of any color.

Card.Name: Rite of Flame
Card.RulesText: Add {R}{R}, then add {R} for each card named Rite of Flame in each graveyard.
